Olivier, was there any other related traces in the log?

It would appear that getSharedTypeConfig(ILaunchConfigurationType) should 
propagate up any CoreExceptions to the inputChanged method so the user gets an 
Error dialog instead of an NPE.

I got a dialog. But it was not helpful. It said something like an error occured 
while removing a launching configuration. I wonder why I got this NPE.

I agree with Darin(S). We need to propogate the exception up to the user in a 
dialog. It looks like saving the shared config, or accessing the shared config 
failed in this case. Don't know why.
